markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Qlippoth](/Traits.aspx?ID=306)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 309 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

A family of fiends hailing from the [Abyss](/Planes.aspx?ID=13), most qlippoth are chaotic evil. Their appearance affects the minds of non-qlippoth that view them.
name: Qlippoth
